document_data.name: Sticky Fingers
document_data.mainbody: '''''Sticky fingers''''' was a [[spell]] that made the caster better at pilfering things using sleights of hand.
document_data.Effects: On casting ''sticky fingers'', the caster's fingers secreted a sticky substance while the hands became more agile. The effect lasted for at least ten minutes (longer for more experienced casters) and could be dispelled at will.
document_data.Components: One version of this spell required both verbal and somatic components.
